li.p: Stay up to date with your county

div.class: inner col col24 first last id1788859c-be76-4aae-9ec6-365d08de00fa

h4.a: Commissioners Court Adopts Budget and Sets Tax Rate

div.div: The Williamson County Commissioners Court unanimously approved the fiscal year 2024-2025 county budget and set the county tax rate on Aug. 27. Read on...

img.alt: Groundbreaking for Ronald Reagan Blvd. Widening

h4.a: WilCo Breaks Ground on Ronald Reagan Blvd. Widening Project

div.div: Williamson County held a groundbreaking ceremony for the Ronald Reagan Widening project from SH 29 to FM 3405. Read on...

h4.a: Williamson County Offices Closed for Labor Day

div.div: Williamson County offices will be closed on Monday, Sept. 2, in observance of Labor Day. Read on...

h4.a: Countywide Design Contest to Determine the 2024 "I Voted" Sticker for WilCo

div.div: The Williamson County Elections Department invites local middle school students to participate in the first-ever Williamson County “I Voted” sticker design contest. Read on...
We want to hear from you. WilCo is conducting a community survey to help improve the delivery of county services. Read on...

h4.a: Williamson County’s River Ranch County Park Launches the “20-Miler Challenge”

div.div: Williamson County’s newest park, River Ranch County Park, is celebrating its first anniversary on July 22, 2024. To celebrate this milestone and promote healthy living and outdoor activity, they’re launching a 20-Miler Challenge. Read on...
